title: Contacts are imported/exported via a UIM/SIM card
answer:
1. Import contacts via a UIM/SIM card to a mobile phone 

 Contacts > Menu > Import/Export > Import from the UIM/SIM card > Select “Import from the UIM/SIM card” or “Import from the storage device” in the pop-up window > select the contacts in the UIM/SIM card to be imported > Click the button in the lower right corner. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109935) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109936)

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109937) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109938)

 2. Export contacts in the storage card to the UIM/SIM card 

 Contacts > Menu > Import/Export > Export to the UIM/SIM card or Export to the storage device> Select the contacts to be exported > Click the button in the lower right corner 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109939) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109940)

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109941) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109942)
